sentence: “I look forward to once again defending the voters of Arizona and defeating this ridiculous attempt to undermine our elections,” said Democratic Secretary of State Katie Hobbs, a Democrat and a defendant in the case.
author: ASSOCIATED PRESS
title: GOP lawsuit looks to throw out absentee voting in Arizona

sentence: PHOENIX (AP) — Republican Attorney General Mark Brnovich and Democratic Secretary of State Katie Hobbs both urged the state Supreme Court not to accept a petition filed by the Arizona Republican Party asking to strike down early voting laws used by 90% of voters.
author: Associated Press
title: Brnovich, Hobbs urge court to reject GOP early ballot suit

sentence: Ducey's signing letter was sent to Democratic Secretary of State Katie Hobbs, an abortion rights supporter who is seeking her party's nomination in November's election to replace Ducey, who is term-limited.
title: Arizona Gov. Doug Ducey signs bills limiting abortion, trans rights

sentence: Earlier this week, Arizona Secretary of State Katie Hobbs, a Democrat and a defendant in the lawsuit, condemned the state GOP’s attempt to eradicate mail-in voting.
author: Chris Walker
title: Arizona Supreme Court Rejects State GOP Lawsuit to Eliminate Mail-In Voting

sentence: "Today, the Arizona Supreme Court dismissed a dangerous lawsuit that threatened early voting in the state and challenged provisions of the Elections Procedures Manual," tweeted Katie Hobbs, Arizona's Democratic secretary of state.
author: Jon Skolnik
title: GOP-led Arizona Supreme Court shuts down Republican bid to ban early voting
